vdb.name: twitter
vdb.description: Shows how to call Web Services

model.name: twitterView
model.metadata: CREATE VIEW TwitterUserTimelineView( id string, created_at string, text string ) AS SELECT tweet.id, tweet.created_at, tweet.text FROM (call twitter.invokeHTTP(endpoint=>'https://api.twitter.com/1.1/statuses/user_timeline.json', action=>'GET')) w, XMLTABLE('/twitter/twitter' passing JSONTOXML('twitter', w.result) columns id string PATH 'id_str', created_at string PATH 'created_at', text string PATH 'text') tweet;
